title: Fix: tickboard.dev returns 404 for all assets
description:
tickboard.dev (cloud deployment) returns 404 for all JS/CSS assets, manifest.json, and favicons. Board doesn't load at all.

Errors:
- app-CzImBuAL.js 404
- app-BFFKgTMz.css 404  
- manifest.json 404
- favicon.svg, favicon-32x32.png, favicon-16x16.png 404

Likely cause: Cloud deployment not updated with new Lit build output, or asset paths misconfigured for cloud.
